categories: Category:Battles of the Great Jedi Purge

nodes.text: During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the Sith Lord Darth Vader led an Imperial assault on the planet Volik. During the attack, the Jedi Master Dorin Se'ol distracted the Sith Lord long enough for a small group of the former's students to escape Volik before the Jedi perished.

The assault on Volik was first mentioned in The Unknown Regions, a sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game that was developed by Wizards of the Coast. The Unknown Regions was written by Sterling Hershey, Rodney Thompson, and Daniel Wallace, and was published in 2010.
